text:
[Verse]
Sunset sky so bright
Colors fade to night
Dreams take off in flight
In this fading light

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the breeze
Leaves dance through the trees
Heart feels so at ease
In these moments
Please

[Chorus]
Sunset dreaming
Heart's still beating
Lost in the feeling
This moment's healing

[Verse 3]
Shadows start to blend
In this time we spend
Thoughts of you ascend
Until the very end

[Bridge]
Stars begin to glow
Moon is hanging low
Time's moving so slow
In this peaceful flow

[Chorus]
Sunset dreaming
Heart's still beating
Lost in the feeling
This moment's healing
title: Sunset Dreaming
